translations: [金融]汇票（draft 的复数形式）；草稿（箱）；精绵

sentences.sentence: There is no essential difference between the two drafts.
sentences.translation: 两份草稿没有本质上的不同。

sentences.sentence: Most drafts do not improve upon delivery.
sentences.translation: 大多数文稿在表达的时候没有被改善。

sentences.sentence: Drafts of the Bylaws have attracted some criticism.
sentences.translation: 有些人对该章程草案提出了批评。
